Python Notebooks ∞

Table of Contents

Below are some Google colab notebooks that use Lasair API, which has a token authentication scheme. The notebooks below have a “free sample” token that allows only 10 calls to the API in an hour. You can get a much better token by

  • get a Lasair account here

  • follow the instructions in the API documentation

  • then copy the notebook to your own Google account.

  • Cone Search
  • Streams
  • Sherlock (Astronomical context)
  • Bright SNe
  • SN like Candidates
  • TDE Candidates
  • Get Watchlist and Area Hits

This notebook does not require an API key.

  • Fetching Kafka streams from Lasair

Please Contact us with any notebooks that you would like to share.
